welcome.pack.title: sky1234
welcome.pack.subtitle: &aThis is a modded Skyblock pack that requires some knowledge of mods.
welcome.pack.description: &cI'm limited in my abilities and can't cater to everyone's taste. If you don't like this pack, feel free to quit and find another one that suits you.
welcome.projecte.title: &l[Optional]&2&l Lower Game Difficulty
welcome.projecte.subtitle: &c&lUse in moderation.
welcome.bug.title: &6&lReport Bugs/Suggestions
welcome.thanks.title: Special Thanks
welcome.thanks.description:
&aAuthor:落秋(FalAut) 
Thanks

To all mod creators, tutorial/wiki makers

秋明Sweet's live streaming and promotion

肆a、春夏冬明、晓阳、洛神主动、fish-旦、工具人二号、秋明 and his live stream audience for helping me discover many bugs

You for playing this pack.
welcome.switchsky.title: Switching island
welcome.switchsky.subtitle: Don't like the island now?
welcome.switchsky.description:
The respawn point will not change 
 enter /skyblock spawn to return to the island
stage1.iron.subtitle: &aMolten Iron Bucket
stage1.coal.subtitle: &aCharcoal to Coal
stage1.animal_spawner.subtitle: &aSearch for Spawn Eggs in JEI to see the recipe.
stage1.iron.nether.title: &4The Nether will not spawn creatures but will spawn all the slime islands of the Tinkers' Construct
stage1.iron.slime.subtitle: &aGenerated in the Nether
stage1.nether_altar.title: Crimson Altar
stage1.nether_altar.subtitle: &aNatural altars placed in the Nether will turn into crimson altars.
stage2.mineral.title: Place a vein with a radius of 16 at your current location.
stage3.mana_tablet.title: Skip
stage4.fission_reactor.title: No Need Add Water,No Radiation, Burn Speed Up to 9999
stage4.sps.title: 1mb Polonium = 1mb Antimatter, Energy Only Requires 40FE/t
stage4.entropy_reactor.subtitle: &c&lAfter placing it, right-click the center of the front to form the structure. Input corruption fragments on the right, and output products on the back.
stage4.entropy_reactor.description: &a&lDon't input too fast, or it will get stuck!
